actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for a runoff election for the offices of the President and Vice-President of the United States if no candidates receives a majority of the electoral college.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for a runoff election for the offices of the President and Vice President if no candidate receives a majority of electoral college votes.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for a runoff election for the offices of the President and Vice-President of the United States if no candidates receives a majority of the electoral college.
